website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a robot that will clean your windows without breaking your budget, this is the one to choose. It offers technology and capabilities that are impressive considering the budget-friendly price.
pros: This robotic window cleaner earns praise for being easy to use and working well for most windows
Comes with a remote and access to a responsive app that allows you to control it with your smartphone
Offers 3 cleaning modes and reliable suction
Has a back-up safety rope just in case it's needed
cons: Tends to leave smudges if windows are very dirty or dusty
Cleans better than it polishes, as streaks are more likely to occur if the pad isn't wet enough

customer_reviews.title: Saves time!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is sooooo cool! I live in the desert & my windows need constant cleaning to keep the dust away. I do t even need to spray windows with cleaner unless there’s fingerprints & even then it’s not always needed. I sit the Gecko on the window while I vacuum or do laundry. It beeps when it’s done & I love it to the next window. Extremely simple!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kline

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it badly
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Got this robot window cleaner few days ago. Nice design but it doesn’t work. This machine can move in any direction EXCEPT UPWARD. Moving up to clean window is the the main reason why I bought this machine. It automatically slide down every time the machine goes up. The materials of the product doesn’t match with the price. Not recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yonghang liu

customer_reviews.title: Cleans okay, but not wireless.
customer_reviews.text: This little Robot does an okay job, if you keep the pads moist, otherwise it just smears dirt, I have 4 kids and they get my slide door dirty from both sides, and since I don't want to clean it everyday, this Robot helps out, only issue is I though it would be battery powered, but it always needs to be plugged in, via AC adapter. The battery is only for incase power goes out so the Robot doesn't loose suction and fall.
customer_reviews.author: Rolaelectronics

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget gift for the short person. :)
customer_reviews.text: First day use and have a lot of windows. The key to window cleaners solution is to use a misting light foaming one in order for it to not slip. It does well sticking to the window when it’s cleaning. It might take two times to get it clear 100% but it does a really good job cleaning. I can’t reach high places in the doors that have glass this is so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget to help keep windows clean on a regular basis!
customer_reviews.text: The Gecko robot is a great tool for windows that aren’t caked on dirty. My windows hadn’t been cleaned in about 7 months and the robot did great with them! It’s very helpful to get all the dust that can accumulate easily. Having the remote to operate it as well was helpful. The robot does need to be plugged in while working but that wasn’t an issue for our home but if it was wireless it would be even better!
customer_reviews.author: StagerRoz

customer_reviews.title: Make window cleaning so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! I didn’t know what to think, but the suction is great and it cleans with or without the cleaner. The app works really well with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What took me so long to buy this beauty?
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! Does an amazing job! It’s easy to use, reaches places that it’s impossible to reach otherwise. I loooved it I did only 1/2 of my windows to see the difference (the left part is the cleaned part, the right one is how my windows look without cleaning... shock!)
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Uribe

customer_reviews.title: doesn't climb up- won't obey remote- slips
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to have a way to clean my second story windows in my living room safely. This robot just didn't make the cut. It wouldn't climb up, which was the entire reason for the purchase. It slips when you try the up option. It left large areas uncleaned and wasn't able to get the dirt off of the inside of the windows. It did wipe off dust, but not dirt. It kept getting confused. The idea is good, but it needs more engineering. If the unit is wet enough to clean, it won't climb- just slips. If it's dry enough to climb, it won't clean. So disappointed... :(
customer_reviews.author: Todd Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe it but it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for washing the outside of our large windows and it does an excellent job! Yes, it’s quite a bit of babysitting and guiding it at times but beats hiring professionals twice a year!

customer_reviews.title: It Just Works!
customer_reviews.text: With large or tall, solid windows, this is a really nice and useful device. It's not amazing on corners, I will admit, but with a quick touch up on those, it does clean well. As with other robots, it tends to gather a crowd of on lookers when it starts cleaning. For the price, I think it's a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Burket

customer_reviews.title: Grateful  to find
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 stars. So great to use worked on condo windows . We are on the fourth floor and a ladder is not a option for us. customer_reviews.title: Very impressed and pleased.
customer_reviews.text: If you live on a very high floor and the windows are almost impossible to clean, this is the product for you. The suction power of this device is amazing. At first windows you may be apprehensive, but you will soon see that the robot does its job well. It does not clean the corners, but costs almost half the price of other robots of similar quality. Very light for its size. If the power goes out, its internal battery keeps it stuck to the glass long enough to be safely removed. Still, this robot is not like the floor ones. It should always be used under adult supervision. Especially if it's outside. Worth Buying replacement Pads. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected

customer_reviews.title: Good value if you have high windows

It is effective at reducing sand and dirt on windows. I run it about every 2 weeks. Over all, I am happy with it. I have the cleanest windows in my building.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need and makes me smile
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little fella for just over a month and I’m in love. We live on the 6th floor with fixed screens outside all of our sliding doors, so no chance of external washers. After a season of rain, the windows are covered with water spots. The Gecko fits nicely between the glass and the screen and disappears those water spots in about 15 minutes for a 3’X 8’ door panel. The only thing keeping it from a 5-star rating is that It’s not great on tough dirt. Redos solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Franny

customer_reviews.title: No More Washing Windows

The remote is easy to use but for some reason I can't make it come down when instructed (probably user error). There is also an app for your phone which is nice in case you misplace the remote. It comes with extra pads which is also nice but I would recommend getting an extension cord. Overall, I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lane

customer_reviews.title: Gecko window cleaner is best thing since Roomba floor robot.
customer_reviews.text: The Gecko robot window cleaner works great and better than expected. We have over 100 windows, sliding doors, and glass railings that have never looked so good. Some windows and sliding doors are over 8' high. The Gecko let's me tell it to clean going up, which goes to to top, then down to the bottom. I bought extra pads and change them often. It only takes 4-5 sprays to the bottom pad to clean most windows without getting water all over. It takes about 30 minutes for each 4'x8' panel. I already have friends who want one. I might buy another one, so I can have one going on the inside also.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Sluyk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work

customer_reviews.author: The West got me

customer_reviews.title: What a great product !
customer_reviews.text: Product worked exactly as advertised. It takes just a few minutes to run a cycle on the window and left them looking like they had been professionally cleaned. If you look closely, you can see that it doesn't get in the corners but since we do have a professional come every three months, the build-up in the corners isn't that bad and the majority of the window looks perfect. Most homeowners in our neighborhood have someone come out every 6 to 8 weeks so this product is saving us money by only having someone come out half as often.
customer_reviews.author: L F

customer_reviews.title: No more streaks!

It only takes a couple sprays of water or cleaner to do the job. I found that starting at the left edge in the middle then using the 'up' button on the remote, catches the edges the best. It misses the corners a little but the rest of the glass is streak free. I can do other things while this is working. Love it!

But I am totally impressed so far! Will update if that changes.

Comes with 14 washable pads that are 2 sided. I rinsed off the outside windows if they were especially dusty and let them dry so as not to burn through dirty pads and avoid any streaking. Well worth the money!

I also cleaned the outside glass table and it along with the windows looks great and decidedly better then any other method I’ve tried. Very happy with this product!

product_meta.title: Gladwell, Gecko Robot Window Cleaner, Smart Glass Cleaning Robotic Technology App and Remote, Powered Washer for Table High Windows Ceiling Magnetic Automatic, Outdoor Indoor, White
product_meta.description: When it comes to cleaning windows, ladders and sponges are incredibly messy, they will often leave you with more of a mess to clean. That is why we created Gecko, we wanted a remote powered window cleaner that would be simple and easy to use to take away the chaos and anxiety that often comes from window cleaning. Features: -LED indicators -Deep clean -Automatically detects edges -App powered and manual modes -Air vent -Safety Rope -3 Automatic cleaning path options -Washable microfiber pads -Anti-Fall technology -Notification buzzer The Mobile App that connects with the Robot can be found under 'GlassBot2' in the App store.
feature_bullets: Intuitive cleaning technology - Our smart artificial intelligence powered design will get your windows clean quickly and efficiently. The gecko detects edges and uses its advanced algorithm to scrub every part of your window, including those hard to reach areas that you would not be able to get to on your own

Safe and secure - With the gecko window cleaner, you do not have to climb ladders or put yourself at risk, you can clean your windows right from your sofa. Our cleaner comes with a safety rope attachment feature, ensuring double protection and security for your device

Remote and app power - The gecko’s smart design allows it to be controlled from the palm of your hand. The gecko comes with a full access app, allowing you to quickly and simply tailor the controls to fit your home

How to use – Start by referring to your user manual, properly secure the cloth pads on the device, plug in the device, spray the pads with 1-2 sprays of cleaning solution, place the device on the window, press the on button (the light will turn blue when it’s secure), secure with provided cable, once secured spray the surface. Make sure not to apply too much solution to the pads or window.

Satisfaction guaranteed - If you have any questions about how to operate this product, please ask it in the customer questions & answers section below. Alternatively, you may reach out to our team via customer support or the contact info in the user manual. We are more than happy to walk you through any technical issues.
